resources.string:
Past.Present.Future.

A look into one of the oldest community before the incorporation of the City of Miami. Originally known as colored town, explore the past in the many Historic cites nearby including the Historic Lyric Theatre. 

Marvel at world renowned artist, Purvis's\ Young original murals. Take a walk back to history, to the home of the Negro baseball league at Dorsey Park. Enjoy delicious food at local soul food restaurants. 

Last, no visit to Overtown is complete without a stop at the Black Police Precinct and Courthouse Museum. 
What are you waiting for? start exploring now.
"
Visit Overtown the title of the app
Welcome to Overtown, a welcoming text
A moving image of the pictures that changes every few seconds.
